info.title: Landed Cost
info.description: Landed Cost provides an all-inclusive cost estimate of international shipments.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Landed Cost, Error Codes and Appendix

post.summary: Landed Cost provides an all-inclusive cost estimate of international shipments.

parameters.name: AccessLicenseNumber
parameters.description:
Authorization: Access Key obtained 
through on-boarding process. 
Contact your UPS representative for 
additional information. Maximum Length:16

parameters.name: transId
parameters.description: An identifier unique to the request. Length 32

parameters.name: transactionSrc
parameters.description: An identifier of the client/source application that is making the request.Length 512

requestBody.description: Landed Cost provides an all-inclusive cost estimate of international shipments.

ShippingHistoryUserKey.description: Unique key to tag shipments in shipping history. It could be MyUPS registration Number or any unique identifier.

LandedCostRequest.description: The root element for the Landed Cost document.

RequestAction.description: Indicates the action to be taken by the service. Only valid value is: LandedCost.

LandedCostRequest_Request.description: A container which contains the service requested.

Request_RequestAction.description: Indicates the action to be taken by the service. Only valid value is: LandedCost.

SuppressQuestionIndicator.description:
Contains the indicator to suppress questions
Y-Yes (suppress questions)
N-No (do not suppress questions)
If not set, defaults to N

LandedCostRequest_QueryRequest.description: Container for the billing and shipment data. Should be in the first round request of LandedCost. It cannot co-exist with EstimateRequest. If EstimateRequest is not present, this tag must be present.

OriginCountryCode.description: Two-character ISO country or territory code where the items shipped from. Cannot be the same as destination country or territory code.

OriginStateProvinceCode.description: State/Province Code of origin country. Required if the 			origin country is Canada CA or Brazil BR.

DestinationCountryCode.description: Two-character ISO code ISO country or territory code where the items 			shipped to. Cannot be the same as origin country or territory code.

DestinationStateProvinceCode.description: State/Province Code of destination country or territory. Required if 			the destination country is Canada CA or Brazil BR.

TransportationMode.description:
Valid values:
1 - Air
2 - Ground
3 - Rail
4 -?? Ocean
If 			not specified, default to Air.

TariffCodeAlert.description:
Contains the indicator for global Tariff Code Alerts.
0  true, send tariff code alerts for all tariff codes in the request.
1  false, do not send tariff code alerts for any of the tariff codes in the request.
This indicator setting supersedes the TariffCodeAlert settings in individual Product Type elements.
Note: by setting this value to 1 false, you will not receive Tariff Code Alerts for the products in the request. 
Note: Invalid values will result in the value being set to true.

ResultCurrencyCode.description: Currency code for the Landed Cost quote. Must be 			three-character ISO code.

Shipment_OriginCountryCode.description: Two-character ISO country or territory code where the items shipped from. Cannot be the same as destination country or territory code.

Shipment_OriginStateProvinceCode.description: State/Province Code of origin country. Required if the 			origin country is Canada CA or Brazil BR.

Shipment_DestinationCountryCode.description: Two-character ISO code ISO country or territory code where the items 			shipped to. Cannot be the same as origin country or territory code.

Shipment_DestinationStateProvinceCode.description: State/Province Code of destination country or territory. Required if 			the destination country is Canada CA or Brazil BR.

Shipment_TransportationMode.description:
Valid values:
1 - Air
2 - Ground
3 - Rail
4 -?? Ocean
If 			not specified, default to Air.

MonetaryValue.description:
The monetary value of the insurance charge for the shipment. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

CurrencyCode.description: Currency code for the transportation charge. Must be 			three-character ISO code.

Shipment_FreightCharges.description: Container for the transportation charge for the shipment.

FreightCharges_MonetaryValue.description:
The monetary value of the insurance charge for the shipment. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

FreightCharges_CurrencyCode.description: Currency code for the transportation charge. Must be 			three-character ISO code.

MonetaryValue.description:
The monetary value of the insurance charge for the shipment.
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

CurrencyCode.description:
Currency code for the insurance charge. Must be
			three-character ISO code.

Shipment_AdditionalInsurance.description: Container for the insurance charge for the shipment.

AdditionalInsurance_MonetaryValue.description:
The monetary value of the insurance charge for the shipment.
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

AdditionalInsurance_CurrencyCode.description:
Currency code for the insurance charge. Must be
			three-character ISO code.

Shipment_TariffCodeAlert.description:
Contains the indicator for global Tariff Code Alerts.
0  true, send tariff code alerts for all tariff codes in the request.
1  false, do not send tariff code alerts for any of the tariff codes in the request.
This indicator setting supersedes the TariffCodeAlert settings in individual Product Type elements.
Note: by setting this value to 1 false, you will not receive Tariff Code Alerts for the products in the request. 
Note: Invalid values will result in the value being set to true.

Shipment_Product.description: Container for the questions at the Product level. Must be in 			the same order as in the QueryRequest.

Product_ProductCountryCodeOfOrigin.description:
ISO country or territory code of the country or territory that the tariff
			information belongs to.

TariffCode.description:
Tariff Code of the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9 and Decimal Point ("."). 
Only 6 numeric fields will be considered during validation for the minimum length of the Tariff Code.

DetailID.description:
Additional information on Tariff Code of the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9 and Decimal point (.). 
The DetailID is used by TradeAbility to help refine results and should not be reported on official customs documents as part of the Tariff Code.

SecondaryTariffCode.description:
Secondary Tariff Code of the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9 and Decimal point (.). 
Only 6 numeric fields will be considered during validation for the minimum length of the Secondary Tariff Code.

SecondaryDetailID.description:
Additional information on Secondary Tariff Code of the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9 and Decimal Point (.). 
The SecondaryDetailID is used by TradeAbility to help refine results and should not be reported on official customs documents as part of the Tariff Code.

Product_TariffInfo.description: A container element which contains the Tariff Code Information.

TariffInfo_TariffCode.description:
Tariff Code of the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9 and Decimal Point ("."). 
Only 6 numeric fields will be considered during validation for the minimum length of the Tariff Code.

TariffInfo_DetailID.description:
Additional information on Tariff Code of the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9 and Decimal point (.). 
The DetailID is used by TradeAbility to help refine results and should not be reported on official customs documents as part of the Tariff Code.

TariffInfo_SecondaryTariffCode.description:
Secondary Tariff Code of the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9 and Decimal point (.). 
Only 6 numeric fields will be considered during validation for the minimum length of the Secondary Tariff Code.

TariffInfo_SecondaryDetailID.description:
Additional information on Secondary Tariff Code of the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9 and Decimal Point (.). 
The SecondaryDetailID is used by TradeAbility to help refine results and should not be reported on official customs documents as part of the Tariff Code.

Value.description: Quantity of products. Must be a positive integer.

Quantity_Value.description: Quantity of products. Must be a positive integer.

UnitCode.description: Valid values are: lb or kg.

UnitDescription.description: Short description of the unit of measurement.

Quantity_UnitOfMeasure.description: Container for the unit of measurement.

UnitOfMeasure_UnitCode.description: Valid values are: lb or kg.

UnitOfMeasure_UnitDescription.description: Short description of the unit of measurement.

MonetaryValue.description:
The monetary value of the unit price for the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 characters after the decimal point. 
The total price of this value ... Quantity*product unit price... may not exceed 999999999999.99.

CurrencyCode.description:
Currency code for the unit price of the product. 
Must be 			three-character ISO code.+G35

Product_UnitPrice.description: Container for the unit price of the product

UnitPrice_MonetaryValue.description:
The monetary value of the unit price for the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 characters after the decimal point. 
The total price of this value ... Quantity*product unit price... may not exceed 999999999999.99.

UnitPrice_CurrencyCode.description:
Currency code for the unit price of the product. 
Must be 			three-character ISO code.+G35

Value.description:
The weight value of the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 characters after the decimal point.

Weight_Value.description:
The weight value of the product. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 characters after the decimal point.

UnitCode.description: Valid values are: lb or kg.

UnitDescription.description: Short description of the unit of measurement.

Weight_UnitOfMeasure.description: Container for the Unit of Measure of weight

Product_TariffCodeAlert.description:
Contains the indicator for individual product element Tariff Code Alerts
0  true, send tariff code alerts for this products tariff code in the request
1  false, do not send tariff code alerts for this products tariff code in the request.
This indicator setting is superseded by the TariffCodeAlert settings at the Global/Shipment level. 
Note: Invalid values will result in the value being set to true.

Shipment_ResultCurrencyCode.description: Currency code for the Landed Cost quote. Must be 			three-character ISO code.

QueryRequest_SuppressQuestionIndicator.description:
Contains the indicator to suppress questions
Y-Yes (suppress questions)
N-No (do not suppress questions)
If not set, defaults to N

TransactionDigest.description: Encoded shipment parameters returned in 			LandedCostResponse/QueryResponse

LandedCostRequest_EstimateRequest.description:
Container for the answers to the questions from the previous transaction. 
Cannot be in the first round request of LandedCost. It cannot co-exist with QueryRequest. If QueryRequest is not present, this tag must be present.

EstimateRequest_Shipment.description: Container for the answers to questions at shipment level 			and Product level.

Type.description:
Values are:
1 - Question that requires a numeric answer only.
2 - Question that requires an answer true or false.
3  Question that has multiple choice answers and the answers are provided.
Only one choice is allowed.

Question_Answer.description:
Answer to the shipment level question. Valid values:
Type 1 question - numeric value.
Type 2 question - true or false.
Type 3 question - Key of the Answer/Option 
If this container is not provided, there is not an  answer for the question.

Type.description:
Values are:
1 - Question that requires a numeric answer only.
2 - Question that requires an answer true or false.
3  Question that has multiple choice answers and the answers are provided.
Only one choice is allowed.

EstimateRequest_TransactionDigest.description: Encoded shipment parameters returned in 			LandedCostResponse/QueryResponse

LandedCostRequest_ShippingHistoryUserKey.description: Unique key to tag shipments in shipping history. It could be MyUPS registration Number or any unique identifier.

LandedCostResponse.description: A container which contains the service status returned.

LandedCostResponse_Response.description: Response for warning and other information

TransactionDigest.description: Encoded shipment parameters that are required in 			LandedCostRequest/EstimateRequest.

SuppressQuestionIndicator.description:
Contains the indicator to suppress questions
Y-Yes (suppress questions)
N-No (do not suppress questions)
If not set, defaults to N

LandedCostResponse_QueryResponse.description:
Container for the question, used to give a more accurate landed cost quote. It cannot co-exist with EstimateResponse. 
If EstimateRespnse is not present, this tag must be present. 
QueryResponse can be returned up to twice before the landed cost quote is given.

QueryResponse_Shipment.description: Container for the questions at the Shipment level and Product 			level.

Question_Type.description:
Values are:
1 - Question that requires a numeric answer only.
2 - Question that requires an answer true or false.
3  Question that has multiple choice answers and the answers are provided.
Only one choice is allowed.

Question_Options.description: Container for the choice of answer. Present when the 			question type is 3.

Key.description: Key of the answer for question type 3.

Options_Option.description: Container for the choice of answer. Present when the 			question type is 3.

Option_Key.description: Key of the answer for question type 3.

QueryResponse_TransactionDigest.description: Encoded shipment parameters that are required in 			LandedCostRequest/EstimateRequest.

QueryResponse_SuppressQuestionIndicator.description:
Contains the indicator to suppress questions
Y-Yes (suppress questions)
N-No (do not suppress questions)
If not set, defaults to N

SuppressQuestionIndicator.description:
Contains the indicator to suppress questions
Y-Yes (suppress questions)
N-No (do not suppress questions)
If not set, defaults to N

LandedCostResponse_EstimateResponse.description: Container for landed Cost quote. It cannot co-exist with QueryResponse. If QueryRespnse is not present, this tag must be present.

Date.description:
Date the transaction is returned to user. 
Format 			MM/DD/YYYY

Time.description:
Time the transaction is returned to user. 
Format HH24:MM 			ET

TransactionInfo_Date.description:
Date the transaction is returned to user. 
Format 			MM/DD/YYYY

TransactionInfo_Time.description:
Time the transaction is returned to user. 
Format HH24:MM 			ET

MonetaryValue.description:
Amount charged for the transaction. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

CurrencyCode.description: Currency code of the transaction charge.

TransactionInfo_TransactionCharge.description: The charge for the successful landed cost transaction 			that returns landed cost estimate.

TransactionCharge_MonetaryValue.description:
Amount charged for the transaction. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

TransactionCharge_CurrencyCode.description: Currency code of the transaction charge.

CurrencyCode.description: Currency Code provided by user in the LandedCostRequest/QueryRequest/Shipment/Result Currency. If not specified, it is shipment destination country or territory's currency code.

TotalLandedCost.description:
The total Landed Cost ...sum of shipment level charge and all Product level charges. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 characters after the decimal point.

ShipmentEstimate_CurrencyCode.description: Currency Code provided by user in the LandedCostRequest/QueryRequest/Shipment/Result Currency. If not specified, it is shipment destination country or territory's currency code.

TaxesAndFees.description:
Shipment Level Taxes and Fees. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

AdditionalInsuranceCost.description:
Insurance cost value in the result currency. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

TransportationCost.description:
Transportation cost value in the result currency. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

SubTotal.description:
Shipment level charge... sum of Shipment TaxesAndFees, AddtionalInsuranceCost and TransportationCost. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 characters after the decimal point.

ShipmentEstimate_ShipmentCharges.description: Container for the shipment level cost

ShipmentCharges_TaxesAndFees.description:
Shipment Level Taxes and Fees. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

ShipmentCharges_AdditionalInsuranceCost.description:
Insurance cost value in the result currency. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

ShipmentCharges_TransportationCost.description:
Transportation cost value in the result currency. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

ShipmentCharges_SubTotal.description:
Shipment level charge... sum of Shipment TaxesAndFees, AddtionalInsuranceCost and TransportationCost. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 characters after the decimal point.

ProductsSubTotal.description:
Sum of all Product level charges.  
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

ShipmentEstimate_ProductsCharges.description: Container for the list of each Product charges and 			Products total charges

ProductsCharges_Product.description: Container for each Product cost. In the same sequence as 			in the QueryRequest.

Duties.description: Product duties. Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

TaxesAndFees.description:
Product taxes and fees. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

VAT.description:
Product VAT. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

CostOfGoods.description:
Product price unit price * quantity. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

SubTotal.description:
The product total cost ...sum of Duties, TaxesAndFees, VAT and CostOfGoods. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 characters after the decimal point.

Charges_Duties.description: Product duties. Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

Charges_TaxesAndFees.description:
Product taxes and fees. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

Charges_VAT.description:
Product VAT. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

Charges_CostOfGoods.description:
Product price unit price * quantity. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

Charges_SubTotal.description:
The product total cost ...sum of Duties, TaxesAndFees, VAT and CostOfGoods. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 characters after the decimal point.

ProductsCharges_ProductsSubTotal.description:
Sum of all Product level charges.  
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 digits after the decimal.

ShipmentEstimate_TotalLandedCost.description:
The total Landed Cost ...sum of shipment level charge and all Product level charges. 
Valid characters are 0-9, Decimal Point ("."), and Thousand separator (","). 
Limit to 4 characters after the decimal point.

EstimateResponse_SuppressQuestionIndicat.description:
Contains the indicator to suppress questions
Y-Yes (suppress questions)
N-No (do not suppress questions)
If not set, defaults to N
